mutants.code:
def count_good_pairs(n, a, b):
    c = [a[i] - b[i] for i in range(n)]
    c = sorted(c)
    p1 = 1
    p2 = n - 1
    count = 0
    while p2 > p1:
        x1 = c[p1]
        x2 = c[p2]
        if x1 + x2 > 0:
            count += p2 - p1
            p2 -= 1
        else:
            p1 += 1
    return count
